question:
[Gino] and [Jami] asked their mother, if they could go play in the pool. [Gerald] and his sister, [Alice] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Freddie] played chess with his brother [Lawrence]. [Manuel] and his sister, [Jami] love it when their grandmother visits because she spoils them. She is coming this week to watch them while their parents are out of town. [Gerald] and his sister, [Alice], went to a sneak preview of the Avengers movie and loved it. [Manuel] and his uncle [Joseph] went to the movies Sunday after church and got popcorn and candy while they were there. [Michele] went to her son [Gino]'s House [Gerald] took his son [Joseph] out for pizza. [Lawrence] and his brother [Gerald] always played pranks on each other
Question: How is [Freddie] related to [Michele]?
